data.name: Sample - Microsoft Sentinel - 1.0.0
data.description: Sample playbooks for "Microsoft Sentinel" connector. If you are planning to use any of the sample playbooks in your environment, ensure that you clone those playbooks and move them to a different collection, since the sample playbook collection gets deleted during connector upgrade and delete.

workflows.name: Update Threat Intelligence Indicator
workflows.description: Updates a specific threat intelligence indicator in Microsoft Sentinel based on the threat intelligence indicator ID, workspace subscription ID, workspace resource group, workspace name and other input parameters that you have specified.

arguments.title: Microsoft Sentinel: Update Threat Intelligence Indicator

workflows.name: Get Watchlist
workflows.description: Retrieves a specific watchlist without watchlist items from Microsoft Sentinel based on the watchlist alias, workspace subscription ID, workspace resource group and workspace name that you have specified.

workflows.name: Get All Incident Relations
workflows.description: Retrieves all incident relations from Microsoft Sentinel based on the incident ID, workspace subscription ID, workspace resource group, workspace name, and other input parameters you have specified.

arguments.title: Microsoft Sentinel: Get All Incident Relations

workflows.name: Get Incident List
workflows.description: Retrieves all incidents from Microsoft Sentinel based on the workspace subscription ID, workspace resource group, workspace name, and other input parameters that you have specified.

workflows.name: Update Incident
workflows.description: Updates an incident in Microsoft Sentinel based on the incident ID, Workspace Subscription ID, Workspace Resource Group, workspace name ID, and other input parameters that you have specified.

workflows.name: Delete Threat Intelligence Indicator
workflows.description: Deletes a specific threat intelligence indicator in Microsoft Sentinel based on the threat Intelligence Indicator ID, workspace subscription ID, workspace resource group, workspace name that you have specified.

arguments.title: Microsoft Sentinel: Delete Threat Intelligence Indicator

workflows.name: Create Threat Intelligence Indicator
workflows.description: Creates a threat intelligence indicator in Microsoft Sentinel based on the workspace subscription ID, workspace resource group, workspace name, and other input parameters you have specified.

arguments.title: Microsoft Sentinel: Create Threat Intelligence Indicator

workflows.name: Get Incident Alert List
workflows.description: Retrieves all alerts associated with a specific incident from Microsoft Sentinel based on the incident ID, workspace subscription ID, workspace resource group, workspace name ID that you have specified.

arguments.title: Microsoft Sentinel: Get Incident Alert List

workflows.name: Get Incident Relation
workflows.description: Retrieves a specific relation of a incident from Microsoft Sentinel based on the incident ID, relation name, workspace subscription ID, workspace resource group and workspace name that you have specified.

workflows.name: Get All Incident Comments
workflows.description: Retrieves all incident comments from Microsoft Sentinel based on the incident ID, workspace subscription ID, workspace resource group, workspace name, and other input parameters you have specified.

arguments.title: Microsoft Sentinel: Get All Incident Comments

workflows.name: Update Incident Comment
workflows.description: Updates an incident comment in Microsoft Sentinel based on the incident comment ID, incident ID, message, workspace subscription ID, workspace resource group, and workspace name that you have specified.

workflows.name: > Microsoft Sentinel > Fetch Incidents
workflows.description: Fetches all incidents from Microsoft Sentinel based on the input parameters you have specified.

step_variables._configuration_schema:
[
  {
    "title": "Workspace Subscription ID",
    "description": "Azure active directory subscription ID from which you want to retrieve the incident from Microsoft Sentinel.",
    "required": true,
    "editable": true,
    "visible": true,
    "type": "text",
    "name": "WorkspaceSubscriptionId",
    "value": "6212c9c8-54a6-41ee-846b-37727030c040"
  },
  {
    "title": "Workspace Resource Group",
    "description": "Azure active directory resource group from which you want to retrieve the incident from Microsoft Sentinel.",
    "required": true,
    "editable": true,
    "visible": true,
    "type": "text",
    "name": "WorkspaceResourceGroup",
    "value": "fortinet-pune"
  },
  {
    "title": "Workspace Name",
    "description": "Name of the workspace from which you want to retrieve the incident from Microsoft Sentinel.",
    "required": true,
    "editable": true,
    "visible": true,
    "type": "text",
    "name": "WorkspaceName",
    "value": "FortiSOAR-Integration"
  },
  {
    "title": "Pull Incidents from Last X Minutes",
    "name": "Pull_Sample_Events_in_Past_X_Minutes",
    "type": "text",
    "tooltip": "Fetch incidents from last X minutes. e.g 5",
    "required": true,
    "editable": true,
    "visible": true,
    "value": 10
  }
]

routes.name: Get Macro Value -> Set Time Configuration
Set Time Configuration -> Get Incident List

workflows.name: Create Watchlist
workflows.description: Creates a watchlist in Microsoft Sentinel based on the display name, item search key, provider, source, workspace subscription ID, workspace resource group, workspace name and other input parameters that you have specified.

workflows.name: Create Watchlist Item
workflows.description: Creates a watchlist item in Microsoft Sentinel based on the watchlist alias, item key value, workspace subscription ID, workspace resource group, workspace name and other input parameters that you have specified.

workflows.name: Delete Incident Relation
workflows.description: Deletes a specific incident relation in Microsoft Sentinel based on the incident ID, relation name, workspace subscription ID, workspace resource group and workspace name that you have specified.

workflows.name: Create Incident Comment
workflows.description: Creates a incident comment in Microsoft Sentinel based on the incident ID, message, workspace subscription ID, workspace resource group, and workspace name that you have specified.

workflows.name: Update Watchlist
workflows.description: Updates an watchlist in Microsoft Sentinel based on the watchlist alias, display name, item search key, provider, source, workspace subscription ID, workspace resource group, workspace name, and other input parameters that you have specified.

workflows.name: Update Watchlist Item
workflows.description: Updates an watchlist item in Microsoft Sentinel based on the watchlist item ID, watchlist alias, item key value, workspace subscription ID, workspace resource group, workspace name, and other input parameters that you have specified.

workflows.name: Get Incident Comment
workflows.description: Retrieves a specific comment of a incident from Microsoft Sentinel based on the incident comment ID, incident ID, workspace subscription ID, workspace resource group and workspace name that you have specified.

workflows.name: Get All Threat Intelligence Indicators
workflows.description: Retrieves all threat intelligence indicators from Microsoft Sentinel based on the workspace subscription ID, workspace resource group, workspace name, and other input parameters you have specified.

workflows.name: Update Incident Relations
workflows.description: Updates an incident relations in Microsoft Sentinel based on the incident ID, relation name, resource ID, workspace subscription ID, workspace resource group, and workspace name that you have specified.
